name: Couscous With Zucchini
keywords: couscous, zucchini, low-fat, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add the garlic, onion, cumin, coriander, zucchini, salt and pepper. Cook over medium-high heat, stirring, until wilted, but do not brown.
Add the water and bring to a boil. Add the couscous and blend well. Cover tightly, remove from the heat and let stand 5 minutes.
Add the butter; stir and blend with a fork to separate the grains. Serve immediately.
